Package dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.blockchain.standardchain

Class BlockChain

java.lang.Object
dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.blockchain.Chain
dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.blockchain.standardchain.BlockChain
Direct Known Subclasses:
MiniChain
public class BlockChain
extends Chain
Implementation for a standard blockchain, adapted from CryptoKass' tutorial https://medium.com/programmers-blockchain/create-simple-blockchain-java-tutorial-from-scratch-6eeed3cb03fa

  • Method Details

    • accessBlock

      public Block accessBlock​(int index)
      Access a specific block element of the chain
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the element
      Returns:
      the block element if index is inside bounderies, null otherwise

    • addBlock

      public boolean addBlock​(Block block)
      Adds a new mined block to the chain
      Parameters:
      block - the block to be added
      Returns:
      true if added, false otherwise

    • getPreviousHash

      public java.lang.String getPreviousHash()
      Gets the last calculated hash for adding a new block for instance
      Returns:
      String with the last hash, "0", if no block is in the chain

    • chainSize

      public int chainSize()
      Gets the size of the blockchain
      Returns:
      size

    • isChainValid

      public java.lang.Boolean isChainValid()
      Method for checking, if the blockchain is valid
      Returns:
      true if valid, false if otherwise (errors are printed to the console)

    • getBlockChain

      public java.util.SortedSet<Block> getBlockChain()
      Gets the blockchain
      Returns:
      the blockChain

    • setBlockChain

      public void setBlockChain​(java.util.SortedSet<Block> blockChain)
      Sets the blockchain (security threat but needed by rdfbeans)
      Parameters:
      blockChain - the blockChain to set
